title: Sembiran Village Experience (Half-day)
overview: Visit Sembiran Village, one of Bali's oldest settlements, known for its ancient culture and traditions.

stops.description: Arrive and explore the village, meet elders and learn about its history.

title: Sembiran Village & North Bali Tour (Full-day)
overview: A full day exploring Sembiran Village and North Bali's attractions.

stops.description: Arrive and explore the village, meet elders and learn about its history.
